list.name: Changes
list.comment: [CUR-507] Test coverage from 64% to 75%. Feature flag integration test with animation fixes. ISO dates saved to spec (ISO8601 with timezone offset). Build scripts for all targets. New mobile build scripts with flavors. IDEA and VSCode run configurations/run targets. Fixed github workflow builds and deploys for dev. Added release-ticket.sh, made claim-ticket.sh work from any diretory. Implements REQ-p00008

list.name: after review with Michael Lewis
list.comment: Reviewed with Michael Lewis. Fixed calendar width issues on the web simply by making it 540 wide instead of 430. Claude did not contribute to this commit. Implements REQ-p00008

changelist.name: after review with Michael Lewis
changelist.comment: Reviewed with Michael Lewis. Fixed calendar width issues on the web simply by making it 540 wide instead of 430. Claude did not contribute to this commit. Implements REQ-p00008

task.summary: firebase init on new firebase only MVP project, depoys hello world to https://hht-diary-mvp.web.app
Enrolls (but bad return)
Firebase functions work, V1
test and coverage 93% in dart 99.33% in TS
ignore .firebase

[CUR-410] More recording screen tests. dart format. REQ-p00008

[CUR-507] Test coverage from 64% to 75%. Feature flag integration test with animation fixes. ISO dates saved to spec (ISO8601 with timezone offset). Build scripts for all targets. New mobile build scripts with flavors. IDEA and VSCode run configurations/run targets. Fixed github workflow builds and deploys for dev. Added release-ticket.sh, made claim-ticket.sh work from any diretory. Implements REQ-p00008

Added release-ticket.sh, made claim-ticket.sh work from any directory. README updates for build flavors. Implements REQ-p00008
